page.title: 20 HOME LIFE
page.content:
A TYPICAL CHILD'S DAY
A TYPICAL DAY FOR ME WOULD BE TO RISE AT 8.45,GET WASHED DRESSED AND HAVE SOME BREAKFAST,USUALLY TOAST OR CORN- FLAKES.PERHAPS I MIGHT WATCH TV FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR,THEN GO TO SCHOOL AT 8.45.THE SCHOOL BELL GOES AT 9.00 WE DO MATHS,ENGLISH,GEOGRAPHY,READING OR WE DRAW UNTIL PLAY_TIME.WE PLAY LOTS OF GAMES SUCH AS ROUNDERS OR BULL_DOG.WE GO BACK INTO SCHOOL AT 11.00 AND GET ON WITH OUR WORK UNTIL LUNCH TIME WHEN WE HAVE AN HOUR FOR LUNCH AND PLAY.IN THE AFTERNOON WE WORK UNTIL 3.15.WHEN I GET CHANGED TO KEEP MY SCOOL CLOTHES CLEAN.THEN I GO OUT TO PLAY TILL 5.00 _TEA TIME.AFTER WHICH I USUALLY GO TO MY FRIENDS HOUSE.WHEN I COME IN I HAVE SUPPER AND THEN I GO TO MY BED.
